page.title: 19CAVALIER BUILDINGS LTD.
page.content: This firm is located a short distance west of Summercourt crossroads and has been established for about 3 years. The firm produces garden sheds, greenhouse frames, cold frames and a variety of garden fencing. Russian Deal and Russian Redwood is the timber used, being bought from supplies in Truro and Falmouth. Other supplies such as nails and other fastenings are bought from St Columb Road or Plymouth. About 20 sheds are produced each week with a variable number of other wooden items. They are distributed chiefly to local garden centres as far afield as Plymouth with occasional orders from places such as Trago Mills. Incuding the owner there are 8 people who work for Cavalier. 1 secretary and the rest in the workshop They work a 40 hour, 5 days a week with variation in overtime.
